mapper.select: SELECT d.* FROM group_device gd LEFT JOIN device d ON d.id=gd.deviceId WHERE gd.groupId=#{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE device set `online`=0 WHERE id in(select id from(SELECT id from device where TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND,updateTime,now())>60) as tb_temp)
mapper.select: SELECT t.* FROM device d inner JOIN group_device gd on d.id=gd.deviceId inner join group_task gt on gt.groupId=gd.groupId inner join task t on t.id = gt.taskId where d.serial=#{serial} having t.createTime < now() AND NOW() < t.endTime
